io.spine.server.bus

Class DispatcherRegistry<C extends io.spine.type.MessageClass<? extends com.google.protobuf.Message>,E extends MessageEnvelope<?,?,?>,D extends MessageDispatcher<C,E>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.bus.DispatcherRegistry<C,E,D>
  • Type Parameters:
    C - the type of the class of dispatched messages
    D - the type of the message dispatchers

    public abstract class DispatcherRegistry<C extends io.spine.type.MessageClass<? extends com.google.protobuf.Message>,E extends MessageEnvelope<?,?,?>,D extends MessageDispatcher<C,E>>
extends java.lang.Object
    A registry of message dispatchers.

        protected java.util.function.BiPredicate<E,D> attributeFilter()
        Returns a filter allowing to tell whether the attributes of the envelope match the dispatcher requirements.

      • dispatcherOf

        protected java.util.Optional<D> dispatcherOf(E envelope)
        Obtains a single dispatcher (if available) for the passed message.
        Parameters:
        envelope - the message to find a dispatcher for
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if more than one dispatcher is found
        API Note:
        This method must be called only for serving UnicastBuses.

      • dispatchersOf

        protected java.util.Set<D> dispatchersOf(C messageClass)
        Obtains all the dispatchers for the passed message class.
        Parameters:
        messageClass - the target message class
        Returns:
        all the registered dispatchers of the given class

      • getDispatcherForType

        protected java.util.Optional<? extends D> getDispatcherForType(C messageClass)
        Obtains a single dispatcher (if available) for the passed message.
        Parameters:
        messageClass - the class of the message to find a dispatcher for
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if more than one dispatcher is found

      • checkDispatcher

        protected void checkDispatcher(D dispatcher)
                        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Ensures that the passed dispatcher is valid.

        The passed dispatcher must expose at least one message class.

        Parameters:
        dispatcher - the dispatcher to check
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the check is failed
